channel.title: Run.bat Errors
channel.description:
This is what Run.bat shows:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 265 1000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:458) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:499) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1970) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:551) at server.main(server.java:111) Blindscape initializing... Loading NPC's... Loading Objects... Loading Mapdata... Blindscape initialized!
When I log in it automatically says "Lost Connection" and then it says:
BANNING Host localhost(flooding)
And then it says:
local ip: (some number) is rejected.
So it won't work, any help appreciated.

item.title: Run.bat Errors
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

You didn’t tab your autospawn correctly.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat Errors
item.dc:creator: @Fire_capez Fire capez
item.description:
@Fire_capez wrote:

It’s something to do with your autospawn. (I don’t know how your autospawn is done if it’s a configuration file make sure your using tabs instead of spaces and that your following the correct procedure)

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat Errors
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Wherever you have put in the number “1 265 1000” you need to change it to “12651000”.

This is shown by:

Format = (I think) Way it is written/typed.

EDIT: After reading Scape-JAVA’s post, you should change it to: 1 265 10000 <----The spaces should be made using the TAB key.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat Errors
item.dc:creator: @Wilddar Wilddar
item.description:
@Wilddar wrote:

This is what Run.bat shows:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “1 265 1000”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.java:48)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:458)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:499)
at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1970)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:551)
at server.main(server.java:111)
Blindscape initializing…
Loading NPC’s…
Loading Objects…
Loading Mapdata…
Blindscape initialized!

When I log in it automatically says “Lost Connection” and then it says:

BANNING Host localhost(flooding)

And then it says:

local ip: (some number) is rejected.

So it won’t work, any help appreciated.
